content:
Hier nochmal der Hinweis auf die FHIR DeveloperDays 2018 vom 14.-16. November in Amsterdam:
https://www.fhirdevdays.com/amsterdam/event-info/
Early Bird Discount endet am 30.9.2018

Das Programm seht und klingt sehr spannend! (Apple, Agfa, Google, Cerner, Microsoft....!)

Wer kommt? Welche Sessions interessieren euch am meisten?
Gibt es Interesse an einem Meeting der D-A-CH-Community im Rahmen der DevDays?

Ich freue mich auf @Stoyan Halkaliev :
Flutter on FHIR
In this tutorial, you will learn about Flutter and the Dart language. How can FHIR resources be converted to Dart classes: what are the best ways and how can you automate the process. You will also be shown the Flutter-FHIR-App generator, which takes a FHIR-Profile and generates a complete functioning flutter app for Android and iOS.
https://www.fhirdevdays.com/amsterdam/schedule-2018/#event-339
please share link to app generator ( avi33tbtt at gmail.com ). thanks alot!
flutter moved so rapidly with many breaking changes, that I need to rework quite some parts of it. Just last week was another release. I plan to work on it in the next couple of weeks.
